about.description: I am a computer engineer who loves nature, lifelong learning, physical activity and videogames.

education.concept: Computer Science Degree - Grado en Ingeniería Informática
education.school: Granada University - Universidad de Granada, Granada, Spain

works.concept: Software engineer internship in Cloud Team
works.description:
Development of internal tools (python, bash) for cloud infrastructure maintenance (EC2 instances, load balancers, EBS, VPCs, Route53 S3, ApiGateway, Lambda) on AWS and kubernetes (EKS + kubectl + k8s python). 
 Analyze, design and implement tasks automation and documentations of the Wazuh Cloud Service. 
Design and reimplementation of internal management APIs. 
Designing new operational procedures to our internals tasks and data flows. 
Monitoring and tasks with Grafana, Promehetheus and Implementing alerting tasks with Lambda functions. 
Respond, resolve and scalete incidents.  
Elastic Stack operations (indice and clusters operations). 
On-Call duties. 
Manage users, groups, policies and roles for internal operations with IAM. 
Redesign and update Cloudformation stacks. 
Mentoring and Onboarding of new team members. 
Actively participate in the Wazuh Community. 
Collaborate with the entire Wazuh organization to solve issues related to orchestation and management tools and Cloud insights
